How Can a Recruiter Support Schools?

Select each word below to review and understand how Michigan Virtual defines academic integrity and its violations in an online environment.

Learn a Service Memberâ€™s Story

The best way to gain a well-rounded understanding of military life is from those who serve. Invite a recruiter to tell you their story so that you may better understand the journey.

Career Deep Dives

A recruiter can conduct a deep dive on 2-3 military jobs, including career progression, education, training, and any civilian equivalents. This could be beneficial for a small group of students that have expressed interest and demonstrated aptitude toward particular careers.

Military Careers Overview

You might invite recruiters to make a presentation on careers with the military to a select group of students or the greater student population.

Collaborate with an Education Service Specialist

Recruiters can collaborate with an Education Service Specialist on learning opportunities for district staff, ASVAB demonstrations, as well as college and career fairs.
